title: HELP PLS Important Ranked Question
body:
Soo.. just a question about ranked queues:

You know how if you rank for a season, your rank will be lower the next season? (e.x. Gold in Season 3 >> Silver in Season 4)
If you don't play ranked for a season, does it completely reset?

replies.body:
Whenever a new season starts, you _do _ need to play your placement matches again but your new rank is calculated based on your old rank plus how well you did in your placements. 

While we do take your old rank into account, your new rank may be higher or lower than your previous one depending on how well you do in your placements.
